scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src/  -e 'js, html, vue' --exec 'npm run build-app-dev; npm run build && node dist/server/server.js'
scripts.start-playground: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src/  -e 'js, html, vue' --exec 'npm run build-dev; npm run build-playground && node dist/server/server-playground.js'
scripts.build-clean-init: mkdir -p dist; rm -rf dist/*; mkdir -p dist/server; mkdir -p uploads
scripts.build-assets: npm run build-clean-init; mkdir -p dist/assets; cp -r assets/* dist/assets/; node src/build/buildHTML.js
scripts.build-app-dev: webpack --config webpack.build.app.dev.js; cp dist/assets/schemio.app.js assets/; cp src/html/index.html dist/assets/index.html; npm run build-standalone; cp dist/assets/schemio-standalone.js assets/.
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-assets; webpack --config webpack.build.prod.js; npm run build-standalone-prod
